Nevenka in sošolci
07 Nov 2019, 08:30 by M. L.
Brežice - V galeriji Posavskega muzeja Brežice so včeraj odprli likovno razstavo Nevenke Rušković iz Brežic, Irene Čmer iz Škofje vasi pri Celju, Draga Leskovarja z Vrhnike, Milana Marina iz Umaga in Stanislava Makuca iz Mežice.
Kot je ob tem povedala direktorica Posavskega muzeja Alenka Černelič Krošelj, je Ruškovićeva začela akademsko izobraževati za slikarstvo v svojem poznejšem obdobju, potem ko je do upokojitve delala v lekarni Splošne bolnišnice Brežice. Tako je letos je magistrirala iz slikarstva. Tudi drugi tokratni razstavljavci z izjemo Leskovarja so študirali in dosegli formalno izobrazbo na likovni akademiji potem, ko so do upokojitve že delali v svojih poklicih na drugih področjih, s tem da so ljubiteljsko tudi slikali in pri tem tudi razstavljali.
Z glasbo sta odprtje pospremili klarinetistka Rea Doria Bergant in pianistka Pierina Cavalliere Mršić iz Glasbene šole Brežice.
text:
Calendula and classmates
07 Nov 2019, 08:30 by M.L.
Brežice - The gallery of the Posavina Museum of Brežice opened the art exhibition of Nevenka Rušković from Brežice, Irene Čmer from Škofja vas near Celje, Drago Leskovar from Vrhnika, Milan Marin from Umag and Stanislav Makuc from Mežica yesterday.
According to the director of the Posavina Museum Alenka Černelič Krošelj, Rušković started to study academically in painting in her later period, after working at the pharmacy of the General Hospital Brezice until her retirement. So this year she got her master’s degree in painting. Other exhibitors this time, with the exception of Leskovar, studied and attained a formal education at the Fine Arts Academy after having already worked in their professions in other fields before retiring, having also been amateur painters and exhibitors.
The opening music was accompanied by clarinetist Rea Doria Bergant and pianist Pierina Cavalliere Mršić from the Brežice School of Music.
